transcript:
Customer: Yalla, Assalamualaikum
Agent: Wa alaikum assalam! Main aapki madad ke liye haazir hoon. Aap bataayen ke aapko kis cheez ki maloomat chahiye?
Agent: Jee, bilkul, aapko
Customer: مجھے اپنی
Agent: Bilkul, main aapki madad kar sakta hoon. Aap apna debit card activate karwane ke liye apne account ka thoda tafseel den, jaise account number ya koi aur zaroori maloomat. Phir main aapko steps bata deta hoon ke aap kaise activate kar sakte hain.
Customer: نہیں ہورہے نہیں کروانا
Agent: Achha, aap apna debit card activate karwana chahte hain. Iske liye aapko apne bank ki phone banking ya ATM pe jaake activate karwana hota hai. Aapke paas card ka number aur apni personal details honi chahiye. Aap apni najdeeki UBL branch se bhi activate karwa sakte hain. Agar aapko account ki koi maloomat chahiye
Customer: نہیں مجھے ویلنس انکواری کروانی ہے
Agent: Bilkul, aap mujhe apna account number bata dijiye, main aapka balance check karke abhi aapko batata hoon.
Customer: 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
Agent: Maazrat chahta hoon, yeh account number mojood nahin hai. Aap dobara se apna account number check karke deejiye, main phir se balance verify kar doon ga.
Customer: 11223344
Agent: Aapke account ka balance 10,500 PKR hai. Agar aapko aur koi madad chahiye, toh bataiye.
